title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 1-1.8 - Non-captive REIT and non-captive RIC
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 1-1.8 - Non-captive REIT and non-captive RIC
State Regulations

Tax Law, section 2(7) - (10)
(a) The term "non-captive REIT" means a REIT
that is not a captive REIT as defined in section 2(9). (b) The term "non-captive RIC" means a RIC
that is not a captive RIC as defined in section 2(10). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
1-1.8

Adopted

New

York State Register December 27, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 52, eff. 12/27/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
